issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h4. PROBLEM
The titanium_prep distributed with the mobile sdk is 64 bits only. 

h4. TEST CASE
1. Open Terminal
2. Type:
$ cd  /Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.8.0.1/iphone
$ ./titanium_prep 
you will get: -bash: ./titanium_prep: Bad CPU type in executable
(if you are running on an intel core duo)

h4. Community discusion
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/130172/iphone-app-hang-after-distribution-build
fields.summary: iOS: titanium_prep file is 64 bits only
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version:Titanium SDK version: 1.8.0.1 (11/21/11 09:02 0bf3392...) 
Javascript Engine: iOS
Platform & version: iOS 5.0
Device Details: This only happens when you try to distribute into device. 
Host Operating System: OSX 10.6.8
Titanium Studio version: 1.0.8.201112282257

comments.body:
h4. TESTING
----

Testing *MUST* occur on both a 32-bit and 64-bit machine.

* Build a project for device in Titanium Studio
* Confirm that there are no build errors and the app runs.
Reopening and closing this issue to update label and Fix Version field.
